parameters.query:
SELECT DISTINCT segment_name, segment_id
FROM public.ses_segments;

parameters.pythonCode:
# Split email_grp into separate items
output = []

for item in _input.all():
    email_grp = item.json.get("email_grp", [])
    for email in email_grp:
        output.append({"json": {"email": email}})

return output

# Split email_grp into separate items
output = []

for item in _input.all():
    email_grp = item.json.get("email_id", [])
    for email in email_grp:
        output.append({"json": {"email": email}})

return output

body.subject_line: Green Ammonia and Smart Bioproduction Drive SES Growth Opportunities
body.full_content:
Green Ammonia and Smart Bioproduction Drive SES Growth Opportunities

Engineering Excellence Newsletter

Issue #XX September 2025 Industry Focus

Shiva Engineering Services (SES) stands as a premier Engineering, Procurement, and Construction (EPC) company with over 18 years of proven excellence in delivering complex industrial projects across India and internationally. Founded in 1999 and headquartered in Vadodara, Gujarat, SES has established itself as a trusted partner for Fortune 500 companies and leading public sector enterprises.

18+ Years Experience 500+ Projects Delivered Pan-India Presence ISO Certified

"At SES, we don't just build facilities â€“ we engineer solutions that drive innovation, ensure safety, and deliver sustainable value for our clients across diverse industrial sectors."

Industry Insights & Readings

Curated Knowledge
Industry Trend

India's Green Ammonia Tender Spurs Fertilizer Sector Decarbonization Opportunities

Green ammonia tenders in India signal growing demand for green hydrogen infrastructure, offering SES EPCM and design opportunities in fertilizer sector decarbonization.

Industry News September 2025
Industry Trend

Latin America's Bio-Inputs Market Growth Fuels Demand for Smart Bioproduction Facilities

Latin America's bio-inputs market growth driven by AI and digital tools signals demand for smart, automated bioproduction facilities, aligning with SES's green chemistry and Industry 4.0 focus.

Industry News September 2025

Company Announcements

Latest Updates
ANNOUNCEMENT

this is test announcement title

this is test announcement description for a project that will be completed in 18months at Kolkata, West Bengal

Date: August 29, 2025

Company Events

Team Building

Date: October 8, 2025 | Venue: referf

Leadership Perspective

In the Metals Materials segment, my experience as a Senior Engineer has taught me the importance of meticulous material selection and process optimization to ensure durability and performance under demanding conditions.

Ready to Transform Your Next Project?

Partner with SES for innovative engineering solutions that deliver results on time and within budget.

Request Consultation Call: +91 74869 33588

Engineering Expertise

Process Engineering â€¢ Project Management â€¢ Environmental Solutions

Safety Systems â€¢ Modular Construction â€¢ Green Technology

EPC Services â€¢ Regulatory Compliance

Shiva Engineering Services

Engineering, Procurement & Construction

18+ Years of Industry Excellence

Vadodara, Gujarat, India

body.raw_data: {"subject_line":{"output":"Green Ammonia and Smart Bioproduction Drive SES Growth Opportunities"},"quote":"In the Metals Materials segment, my experience as a Senior Engineer has taught me the importance of meticulous material selection and process optimization to ensure durability and performance under demanding conditions.","designation":null,"name":null,"emp_spotlight":{"birthday":[],"anniversary":[]},"articles":{"selected_articles":[{"article":"Acme Cleantech Solutions is the lowest bidder for supplying 75,000 tonnes of green ammonia to Paradeep Phosphate Ltd under the government's SIGHT scheme, part of a larger tender for 724,000 tonnes across 13 fertilizer plants. This initiative will drive significant greenfield development or brownfield revamps of green hydrogen generation units and ammonia synthesis plants. SES is highly relevant and can offer EPCM, basic & detailed design, and utility system design services for these projects. Opportunities are emerging in the medium term as these facilities are designed and constructed to meet the long-term supply contracts. This signals a strategic national push for green chemical production in the fertilizer sector.","relevance_score":"95","selection_rationale":"Highly relevant to Agrochemicals Fertilizers segment with strong validation score and recent date. Represents a major green ammonia supply tender driving green hydrogen and ammonia plant projects in India, aligning with SES's EPCM and design services.","strategic_insight":"Green ammonia tenders in India signal growing demand for green hydrogen infrastructure, offering SES EPCM and design opportunities in fertilizer sector decarbonization.","insight_title":"India's Green Ammonia Tender Spurs Fertilizer Sector Decarbonization Opportunities"},{"article":"This article highlights the significant and rapid expansion of the Latin American market for agricultural biologicals, particularly in Brazil, which is projected to exceed USD 3 billion by the end of the decade. This growth is driven by increasing adoption of bio-inputs (biocontrols, biostimulants, biofertilizers), integration with advanced technologies like AI, precision agriculture, and digital tools, and supportive regulatory frameworks. For Shiva Engineering Services (SES), this is a crucial strategic signal. The booming market for bio-inputs directly aligns with SES's focus on green chemistry and sustainability, indicating substantial future demand for engineering and EPCM services in the design, scale-up, and implementation of bioprocessing facilities. The emphasis on advanced automation, AI, and digital tools in agricultural biologicals also resonates with SES's interest in Industry 4.0 and digital twin systems, suggesting opportunities to design smart, highly automated bioproduction plants. Furthermore, the discussion of regulatory changes and the need for high-quality standards, even for \"on-farm\" production, could create demand for modular skid systems or smaller, compliant production units, leveraging SES's expertise in modular and scale-up technologies. Overall, this trend indicates a long-term shift towards more sustainable and technologically advanced chemical processes, presenting significant future engineering and business development opportunities for SES.","relevance_score":"90","selection_rationale":"Strong relevance to Agrochemicals Fertilizers segment with high validation score and recent date. Highlights booming Latin American bio-inputs market with AI and digital integration, signaling future EPCM and engineering opportunities for SES.","strategic_insight":"Latin America's bio-inputs market growth driven by AI and digital tools signals demand for smart, automated bioproduction facilities, aligning with SES's green chemistry and Industry 4.0 focus.","insight_title":"Latin America's Bio-Inputs Market Growth Fuels Demand for Smart Bioproduction Facilities"}]},"faqs":[],"events":{"id":4,"name":"this is test event","description":"sdve","start_date":"2025-10-08T00:00:00+00:00","end_date":"2025-10-09T00:00:00+00:00","venue":"referf","type":"meeting","created_at":"2025-09-16T07:45:44.306089+00:00"},"announcements":{"id":1,"title":"this is test announcement title","description":"this is test announcement description for a project that will be completed in 18months at Kolkata, West Bengal","created_at":"2025-08-29T04:36:51+00:00"}}

body.subject_line: Green Ammonia and Biofertilizer Innovations Power Fertilizer Decarbonization
body.full_content:
Green Ammonia and Biofertilizer Innovations Power Fertilizer Decarbonization

Engineering Excellence Newsletter

Issue #XX | September 2025

Shiva Engineering Services (SES) stands as a premier Engineering, Procurement, and Construction (EPC) company with over 18 years of proven excellence in delivering complex industrial projects across India and internationally. Founded in 1999 and headquartered in Vadodara, Gujarat, SES has established itself as a trusted partner for Fortune 500 companies and leading public sector enterprises.

18+ Years Experience 500+ Projects Delivered Pan-India Presence ISO Certified

"At SES, we don't just build facilities â€“ we engineer solutions that drive innovation, ensure safety, and deliver sustainable value for our clients across diverse industrial sectors."

Industry Insights & Readings

Curated Knowledge
Industry Trend

Green Ammonia Supply Tender Spurs Fertilizer Sector Decarbonization

Green ammonia tenders under SIGHT scheme drive greenfield and brownfield projects, creating EPCM and design service opportunities for SES in India's fertilizer decarbonization.

Industry News September 2025
Industry Trend

Innovative Biofilm Biofertilizer Project Drives Sustainable Agrochemical Manufacturing Opportunities

Biofilm-based biofertilizer innovation signals growing demand for scalable bio-processing and modular manufacturing facilities, aligning with SES's green chemistry focus.

Industry News September 2025

Frequently Asked Questions

Client Queries
Q&A

What are the key engineering challenges in developing greenfield specialty chemicals facilities?

Key challenges include seamless process scale-up, advanced plant design with corrosion-resistant materials, rigorous safety studies, and integration of automation and control systems to ensure operational efficiency and safety.
Q&A

How does SES ensure safety and regulatory compliance in specialty chemicals projects?

SES conducts rigorous HAZOP and safety studies, implements advanced fire and safety system designs, and adheres to hazardous area classifications to mitigate risks and ensure compliance with industry standards.
Q&A

What technologies does SES use to optimize brownfield expansion projects in specialty chemicals?

SES employs advanced tools like laser scanning for accurate as-built data capture, enabling efficient engineering modifications, reducing errors, and compressing project timelines while minimizing operational downtime.

Company Announcements

Latest Updates
ANNOUNCEMENT

Ready to Transform Your Next Project?

Partner with SES for innovative engineering solutions that deliver results on time and within budget.
